div.textarea: 1-The contract has a maximum term of one year. 2-The project scope needs to be within the mandates and duties of the department and unit. 3-The project only has one "freelance" employee at a time. 4-Ensure that the KPIs and scope of freelance and consulting services are different throughout the same "one-year" timeframe. 5-Procurement rules apply to the freelance requirement for education, experience, and accreditation.
